## Switch Toggle

The **switch** input toggles a specific series on/off. Use `toggle_series` to specify which series to control.


```r
add_input(
  input_id = "show_average",
  label = "Show Global Average",
  type = "switch",
  filter_var = "country",
  toggle_series = "Global Average",
  override = TRUE,
  value = TRUE
)
```

## Female Authorship with Benchmark

```{r timeline-pct-female-country}
# Female Authorship with Benchmark
result <- viz_timeline(
  data = data,
  title = "Female Authorship with Benchmark",
  time_var = "decade",
  y_var = "pct_female",
  group_var = "country",
  chart_type = "line",
  subtitle = "Toggle the global average to compare against individual countries",
  x_label = "Decade",
  y_label = "% Female Authors",
  cross_tab_filter_vars = "country"
)

# Set chart height
if (inherits(result, 'highchart')) {
  result <- highcharter::hc_size(result, height = 450)
}

result <- dashboardr:::.embed_cross_tab(result)

# Force container height with explicit wrapper
result <- htmltools::div(
  style = 'height: 450px !important; min-height: 450px !important; width: 100%; overflow: visible;',
  result
)

result
```
